Text: which one?  I already have several, but I am looking for the most recent publication.  In this, the editor claims that the new translation makes the last hundred years of translation seem pale by comparison.  What year and by whom was this  published?  Thank you.
Translation?! Into modern English? It's there already. Does Shakespeare need translating too? Argh.O shame to men!

This book was written as it was ment to be read. In english. If you are an english speaker trying to get an english TRANSLATION of paridise lost I feel very sorry for you.........Would you like a cookie?
